The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#16432](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16432.html) (qt: Add privacy to the Overview page by heb
To avoid conflicts rebased on #17943 which has already @Empact ACK (and mine fwiw).

w.r.t. https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17500#issuecomment-575088028

It seems a bit of formalization could be helpful for our community. How about:

_**Qt Slots and Signals**
Do no make connections to external signals or slots in the `QObject` subclass implementation.
Rationale: Do not introduce needless dependencies._
Rebased and reverted to previous version since #17965 was merged.
Appveyor status is wrong, it actually passed.

oops

`BitcoinGUI::message` is a slot, and there is no need to capture local variable `gui`.
Why not use non-lambda connection syntax?

nm: it does not work too, but could work if remove unused default parameter from 
`BitcoinGUI::message` signature.
Right, originally couldn't connect to slot because of that. I think we can "clean" these later.
